mapper.sql: certificate_id, applicant_id, certificate_no, certificate_time, certificate_dept, qrcode_path, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no, occupation, application_level
mapper.insert: insert into certificate(certificate_id, applicant_id, certificate_no, certificate_time, certificate_dept, qrcode_path, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no, occupation, application_level) values(#{certificateId}, #{applicantId}, #{certificateNo}, #{certificateTime}, #{certificateDept}, #{qrcodePath}, #{fullname}, #{gender}, #{identityType}, #{identityNo}, #{occupation}, #{applicationLevel})
mapper.update:
update certificate
certificate_id = #{certificateId},
applicant_id = #{applicantId},
certificate_no = #{certificateNo},
certificate_time = #{certificateTime},
certificate_dept = #{certificateDept},
qrcode_path = #{qrcodePath},
fullname = #{fullname},
gender = #{gender},
identity_type = #{identityType},
identity_no = #{identityNo},
occupation = #{occupation},
application_level = #{applicationLevel},
where certificate_id = #{certificateId}
